import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./App.scss"; import Header from "./components/Header"; import Heading from "./components/Heading"; import arrow from "./images/ic_arrow.png"; import fb from "./images/Facebook.svg"; function App() { return (
setChecked(!checked)} checked={checked} className="tos-checkbox" type="checkbox" name="terms-of-service" >
); } export default App;
